title: Class 03 Of Exorcism Fantasy - Novel Updates
author: 乔玄
description:
Human beings have discovered the historical fact of the existence of fantasy creatures, thus revealing the truth of history–

I, Dianna Buffett, have a deep enmity and unclear relationship with the number One gambling god. I will def. kill all my blood kin to uncover all the fantasy creature’s secrets to become the winner of life. Now that I think about it, it sure sounds very exciting.

'that won’t be possible'

A battle among the Demonic Cultivation, a school comedy, and romance, shall begin! Thunderstruck. (strikethrough)>
